Share Link:
//Apply Benefit Apply for Disability Benefits Check Application Status
Agmo Studio offers an online disability application you can complete at your convenience. Apply from the comfort of your home or any location at a time most convenient for you. You do not need to drive to your local Agmo Studio office or wait for an appointment with a Agmo Studio representative.
How do I apply for benefits? Here is what you need to do to apply for benefits online:
\n\n- Print and review the Adult Disability Checklist. It will help you gather the information you need to complete the application.
\n\n- Complete the Disability Benefit Application.
\n\n- Complete the Medical Release Form
What information do I need to apply for benefits? We suggest that you have the following information at hand. It will make completing the application much easier. \n\nInformation About You \n- Your date and place of birth and Social Security number \n- The name, Social Security number and date of birth or age of your current spouse and any former spouse. You should also know the dates and places of marriage and dates of divorce or death (if appropriate) \n- Names and dates of birth of your minor children \n- Your bank or other financial institution\'s Routing Transit Number [more info] and the account number, if you want the benefits electronically deposited \nInformation About Your Medical Condition \n- Name, address and phone number of someone we can contact who knows about your medical conditions and can help with your application \n- Detailed information about your medical illnesses, injuries or conditions: \n 1) Detailed information about your medical illnesses, injuries or conditions: \n 2) Names of medicines you are taking and who prescribed them; and Names and dates of medical tests you have had and who sent you for them.
What other ways can i apply? You can also apply: \n ~ By phone - Call us at 1-800-772-1213 from 7 a.m. to 7 p.m. Monday through Friday. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, you can call us at TTY 1-800-325-0778. \n ~ In person - Visit your local Social Security office. (Call first to make an appointment.)
// application form Application Form Submit your application form to us. Enter Full Name Enter OKU Id Enter Phone No
